alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Darke; Mercer (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 5:39PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHERN DARKE, WESTERN AUGLAIZE AND MERCER COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM EDT... At 539 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Ohio City to Fort Recovery, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. The wind may arrive well ahead of any rain. Locations impacted include... Celina, St. Marys, Coldwater, New Bremen, Minster, St. Henry, Union City, Fort Recovery, Ansonia, Rockford, New Knoxville, Moulton, Wabash, Mendon, Osgood, Chickasaw, Burkettsville, North Star, Buckland and Rossburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
